content.raw:
I manually did some profiling in `revolute_joint_test.world` with default camera pose:

before vs after this pull request: 

- Render target avg update time (sec): 0.0083~0.0085 vs 0.0084~0.0086

- Render window's avg FPS: 18~20Hz vs 18~20Hz

Looks like there is not a noticeable impact on performance. But I agree we should set up a performance test in gazebo.
content.html:
I manually did some profiling in revolute_joint_test.world with default camera pose:

before vs after this pull request:

  • Render target avg update time (sec): 0.0083~0.0085 vs 0.0084~0.0086

  • Render window's avg FPS: 18~20Hz vs 18~20Hz

Looks like there is not a noticeable impact on performance. But I agree we should set up a performance test in gazebo.
